subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In 10 career regular-season starts against the Mets, Roger Clemens is 3-5 with a 5.14 earned run average. That is easily his highest E.R.A. against any team.
snippet: In 10 career regular-season starts against the Mets, Roger Clemens is 3-5 with a 5.14 earned run average. That is easily his highest E.R.A. against any team.
